name: Paleo Maryland Crab Cakes
author: sammyc14
summary: Feel free to get creative! Add celery, jalapenos, or other ingredients. You can also use chopped shrimp in this recipe for shrimp cakes.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
1 ½ teaspoons seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay™
directions: Whisk together egg, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, lemon juice, seafood seasoning, and black pepper in a bowl
Place crab meat in a separate bowl and pour egg and mayonnaise mixture in; gently combine with hands
Mix in 1/4 cup almond flour, peppers, green onions, and parsley
Place 1/3 cup almond flour in a shallow bowl
Dredge each cake in almond flour and set on prepared sheet pan; refrigerate for at least 1 hour
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Bake crab cakes in the oven until golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes
